        Create a new regular header
        Parameters:
        title - Header title
        summary - Header summary
        iconRes - Header icon resource id
        tintIcon - Whether to tint icon
        fragmentName - Fragment to start when header is clicked

      • getHeaderId

        public int getHeaderId()
        Returns:
        Header id if set when creating this header, INVALID_ID else

      • setBackgroundColor

        public void setBackgroundColor(int color)
        Set background color of this header. A PreferenceHeadersActivity.notifyHeadersChanged() is required to apply changes
        Parameters:
        color - Color to be the background color
